text:
There should be a mechanism to change properties during a copy or move.
During a copy the owner property should be changed.
The etag property is also a property that should be changed during copy/move.
creator: dirk.verbeeck@pandora.be

text: Did anything happen to this enhancement request since 2001-10-02 ?
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
Fixed together with Bug 28249. See there for infomation.

Currenty the properties displayname, etag and owner are updated.
Are there any other properties that needs changing while copy or
move?
creator: luetzkendorf@apache.org
